name: Juggle Mania
description:

The Game:

In this Fast-Paced Action RhythmGame, you play as the Master Juggler And tonight is your grand performance. Dodge and Deflect as you try to woo the audience and get them riled up.  are you up for the challenge?

Developed in 7 Days for the 7 Day Brackeys 2021 Game Jam with the theme: "Let there Be Chaos".

Controls:

Mouse Movement Aim
Left Mouse Click   \   SpaceDeflect (when in Range)Esc
Pause MenuShiftBullet Time (Once Per Level)Q    \    Right Mouse ClickDodge (Only for Blue Colored Balls)
